scripts.schedule: gcloud scheduler jobs create http squirrelbot-cron --schedule="0 * * * *" --uri="$(gcloud functions describe squirrelbot --region=us-central1 --format='value(serviceConfig.uri)')" --http-method=GET --location=us-central1
scripts.reschedule: gcloud scheduler jobs update http squirrelbot-cron --location=us-central1 --schedule="0 * * * *"
